RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIANNA HILLS set the pace racing in mid track, threatened on the turn moved out past mid track in upper stretch drawing away late. MONGOLIAN MISSION slow early saved ground to upper stretch finishing evenly along the rail. WEDDING CHAPEL chased the pace threatening on the inside to the quarter pole was dispatched by a wide running foe in upper stretch weakening late. LITTLE LUCERITO outrun early faded well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Mongolian Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, finished evenly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Wedding Chapel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, threatened turn, no match inside lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Fianna Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace mid track, threatened on turn, wide lane drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Lucerito
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MELINOE away alertly set the pace in the middle of the track taking a breather on the far turn widening the lead in upper stretch angling in to the three path late. THE MONSTER IRUS rallied to bid on the far turn chasing wide into upper stretch proving no match there holding up for place. TEST YOUR FAITH slow early lagged to upper stretch gaining some late along the inside. ZIPSY ROSE LEE well back early raced wide to upper stretch finishing evenly. MS EXCUSE stalked the early pace then faded on the far turn. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN gave steady retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Test Your Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, gained some late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Melinoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace racing wide, breather far turn, had more

ENTRY.NAME: Unexpectedvalentyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Excuse
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: The Monster Irus
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied to bid far turn, wide into lane, no match, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Zipsy Rose Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early, wide into lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered I n Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AYY LADIES surged to the top on the far turn dueling in close quarters down the lane prevailing gamely on the inside. C C'S WORLD pressed bid on the far turn dueling abreast rival in close quarters down the lane brushing lightly ceding late. BABKA stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch bidding four wide there. GORILLA GIRL advanced on the backside chasing five wide into upper stretch finishing evenly near mid track. MYRA FLEENER raced evenly fading wide down the stretch. IRON WILMA sent clear set the early pace then stopped abruptly on the far turn easing to the wire. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF C C'S WORLD AGAINST THE RIDER OF AYY LADIES FOR INTERFERENCE DURING THE STRETCH RUN WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Gorilla Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5 wide lane, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Ayy Ladies
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged to top far turn, dueled in close lane, cleared gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: C C's World
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed bid on turn, in close abreast lane, brushed, ceded

ENTRY.NAME: Babka
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, bid 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, stopped far turn, eased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Myra Fleener
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded wide lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE MORE CHAPTER unhurried early gave a quick inside move on the far tun wresting a short lead in upper stretch dueling inside of rival to wire prevailing gamely. PONTI PRIDE surged four deep on the far turn coming five wide in upper stretch angling in to duel abreast rival late just missing. ROSE'S PEPINO surged between horses on the far turn bidding from the three path down the lane being outfinished. CLEVELAND POWER surged to duel between horses on the far turn then weakened in the four path upper stretch. STRONG ATTITUDE sent clear set the pace being hooked on the far turn giving way in upper stretch. I RUN stalked the pace fading to upper stretch. EL DUQUE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked far turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Rose's Pepino
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged between far turn, extended three path lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: El Duque
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Cleveland Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied to duel between far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: One More Chapter
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, quick move far turn, led inside, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Ponti Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged four deep far turn, pressed abreast lane, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: I Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, faded to lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 22, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUGAR BRITCHES rushed from the gate was hustled on a solid lead keeping daylight to upper stretch holding safe to wire. MEAN ELENITA gave a prompted middle move chasing a loose leader making some headway on the far turn being held at bay down the stretch. ESTA CALIENTE raced evenly off the pace lacking more. BEE WINGS tracked the early pace fading to upper stretch. SWEETER THAN HONEY folded up after a half mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Britches
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to front, hustled on lead, held safe to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Sweeter Than Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up after a half mile

ENTRY.NAME: Esta Caliente
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked early, faded to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Elenita
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables and Cuadra Cruz Diablo
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased to lane, couldn;t get to winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races N ot Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATLANTIC VAQUERO pressed in bid on the turn dueling abreast rival down the lane winning out in the end. HERE COMES ELI pressed a narrow lead to upper stretch dueling on the inside down the lane ceding grudgingly in the closing yards. FOUND MY BALL chased on the rail to upper stretch angling four wide near the eighth pole hanging in the closing yards. THIRSTY stumbled badly leaving the gate rushing all out to reach the front into the turn giving was rapidly in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Found My Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased on rail, angled 4 wide mid stretch, hung,

ENTRY.NAME: Atlantic Vaquero
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed bid turn, dueled abreast lane, won out

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Eli
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, dueled inside lane, ceded grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Thirsty
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly break, rushed to contention, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PALACE PRINCE gave a four wide move on the turn wresting the lead three deep in upper stretch drawing out under a dfrive. SILENT TIGER set the pace being hooked on the turn coming between horses in upper stretch ceding to outside pressure while saving place. GATES OF HEAVEN pressed up along the inside on the turn extending from the rail in upper stretch weakening late. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK came four wide to upper stretch finishing evenly. BAZOO pressed on the turn then weakened near mid track in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked turn, between top lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Gates of Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on the inside turn, extended rail lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide into lane, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide move turn, led three deep lane, drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Bazoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKIN IT BIG TIME slow early saved ground to upper stretch surging up gamely late. PHILBIN ROAD rallied on the turn bidding four wide down the lane surging gamely to right there at the wire. PAPA DEL CIELO pressed clear on the turn widening in upper stretch being run down between horses late. ROBBEDINTHEBAHAMAS slow early lagged to upper stretch angling in from mid track while surging late. ELUSIVE QUESTION chased to upper stretch weakening late. LORD GRANDE was always outrun. WALTER WHITE pressed the pace wilting abruptly in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Philbin Road
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on turn, bid 4 wide lane, surged gamely late

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Question
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Walter White
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted abruptly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Grande
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Del Cielo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed clear turn, widened lane, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Shakin It Big Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, surged along rail

ENTRY.NAME: Robbedinthebahamas
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, angled in late rallied,
